text: na hyA#sAqmiShaqmUrja#mAqdada#ta utkrOqdaM ku#rvatEq yathA# baqndhAn-mu#mucAqnA u#tkrOqdaM kuqrvata# EqvamEqva tad-yaja#mAnA dEvabaqndhAn-mu#mucAqnA u#tkrOqdaM ku#rvataq iShaqmUrja#mAqtman dadhA#nA vAqNaH Saqtata#nturBavati SaqtAyuqH puru#ShaH SaqtEndri#yaq Ayu#ShyEqvEndriqyE prati# tiShThantyAqjiM dhA#vaqntyana#BijitasyAq-Biji#tyai dunduqBInth saqmAGna#nti paraqmA vA EqShA vAgyA du#nduqBau pa#raqmAmEqva - [  ] 29
